abstract: Unresolved questions surrounding the suspicious death of Chinese-American Pvt Danny Chen in Afghanistan threaten to harm attitudes toward the military in the Asian-American community; Chen's parents and their supports share the suspicion that they will never learn the truth about his death, underscoring the uneasy relationship between Asian-Americans and the military that has persisted for decades.
snippet: Questions surrounding a death at an American outpost in Afghanistan threaten to harm attitudes toward the military in the Asian-American community.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces

lead_paragraph: Questions surrounding a death at an American outpost in Afghanistan threaten to harm attitudes toward the military in the Asian-American community.

headline.main: Soldier’s Death Raises Suspicions in Chinatown
headline.print_headline: Soldier’s Death Raises Suspicions in Chinatown
headline.seo: After Soldier’s Death, a Chinatown Family Seeks Answers
